content:
We will hold an Info Session on Wednesday 9/2 from 1-1:30 pm ET to provide participants with logistics information and answer questions. Track leads will also provide additional information. This meeting will be recorded.

Join from PC, Mac, Linux, iOS or Android: https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/98595850114

Or iPhone one-tap (US Toll): +16468769923,,,98595850114# or +13017158592,,,98595850114#

Or Telephone:
Dial: +1 646 876 9923
Meeting ID: 985 9585 0114
Thanks, @Mark Roberts. Is there a webpage that collects info on the Connectathon, in general, that I could point interested folks at?

For more information please visit the track page here: http://bit.ly/CARIN-TrackPage

The CARIN Track Page can be found here: https://bit.ly/CARIN-HL7-Connectathon

A dedicated Zulip channel for the Connectathon can be found here: http://bit.ly/Zulip-CARINTrack-HL7Connectathon

Some other information can be found on the CARIN Confluence page. The report out will also be uploaded here at conclusion of the event: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91981756
@Mark Roberts That's a delightfully comprehensive info dump. Thanks so much!

Thank you to all those that participated in the CARIN track! A report out from the CARIN track can be found at the bottom of the track page here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=86976603
